actions.committee: House Committee on Banking, Finance and Urban Affairs
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Banking, Finance and Urban Affairs.

committees.committee: House Banking, Finance, and Urban Affairs

official_title: A bill to amend the Depository Institutions Deregulation and Monetary Control Act of 1980 to provide that any person may charge interest on any loan at a rate which is not more than 5 percent greater than the discount rate on ninety-day commercial paper which is in effect at the Federal Reserve bank in the Federal Reserve district in which such person is located.

summary.text: Amends the Depository Institutions Deregulation and Monetary Control Act of 1980 to make the interest rate ceiling applicable to any loan rather than business or agricultural loans in excess of $25,000. Postpones the effective date of such ceiling until January 1, 1981.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Depository Institutions Deregulation and Monetary Control Act of 1980 to provide that any person may charge interest on any loan at a rate which is not more than 5 percent greater than the discount rate on ninety-day commercial paper which is in effect at the Federal Reserve bank in the Federal Reserve district in which such person is located.
